snippet.title: ARC Raiders | Gameplay Reveal
snippet.description:
ARC Raiders is a multiplayer extraction adventure set in a distant future earth. Here’s a first close look at gameplay, captured during our tech test last month. We follow a squad of three Raiders as they venture above ground on a quest in the Buried City. 

ARC Raiders releases in 2025 on PC via Steam and Epic Games Store, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and on cloud streaming through Nvidia GeForce Now.  For more info:

🔗 join the Discord: https://discord.com/invite/arcraiders 
🔗 follow the game on X: https://x.com/ARCRaidersGame
🔗 sign up for playtests & wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1808500/ARC_Raiders/
